component.name: Profex
component.summary: Open Source XRD and Rietveld Refinement

description.p: Profex is a graphical user interface for Rietveld refinement of powder X-ray diffraction (XRD) data with the program BGMN. It can be used for phase identification, phase quantification, structure refinement, and export of results and graphs to tables and figures.
